fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Interfere with a player, secretly changing their target to be a Striked player of your choosing.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If one or more Striked players are alive, learn the faction and alignment of players you visit.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.
